summary: By request, I made a Light Armor Version of my Plate Hoods Pack.
descriptionHtml:
This pack contains recipes for hoods for Light Armor, to include Hide, Leather, Elven, Scaled, Glass, Elven Gilded, and 2 varieties for Dragonscale.

Not only do they look great, but they are more valuable to vendors as they are rare, are non-enchanted for you to have free reighn with, and are completely upgradable. Also, you will still get the appropriate bonuses for all those fancy armor set perks. You also have 3 version to chose from, Higher, Lower, and Normal Armor values in regards to their respective armor class.

These do not replace anything in the game, and blend right in with the play as you still need the appropriate skills to make.

For a Heavy Armor version, go here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14062

Please let me know if you find any bugs, have any suggestions or requests. Enjoy!
author: Elite Goliath
